description: Master the classic Greek salad with this recipe. Topped with crumbly Greek feta and a zesty dressing, it makes a great meat-free addition to any summer barbie.
keywords: Greek salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Video,Low sugar,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Greek Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 green capsicum, deseeded, membranes removed, cut into 2cm pieces
2 Lebanese cucumbers, quartered lengthways, thickly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place capsicum, onion, cucumber, tomato and olives in a large bowl, then toss to combine.
Combine oregano, vinegar and oil in a jug.
Transfer salad to a large plate. Top with feta, drizzle over dressing, season with pepper and serve.
